mapper.select: SELECT Month(cash_date)as month, SUM(CASE WHEN cash_kind='수입' THEN cash_price WHEN cash_kind='지출' THEN -cash_price END)as price FROM cash WHERE YEAR(cash_date)=${year} AND member_id=#{memberId} GROUP BY Month(cash_date)
mapper.update: update cash SET cash_kind=#{cashKind}, category_name=#{categoryName}, cash_price=#{cashPrice}, cash_place=#{cashPlace}, cash_memo=#{cashMemo} WHERE cash_no=#{cashNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='수입' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_date=#{cashDate}),0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='지출' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_date=#{cashDate}),0) FROM dual

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='수입' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(cash_date) = #{month}),0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='지출' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(cash_date) = #{month}),0) FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( cash_kind, category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo, member_id, cash_date ) VALUES( #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo}, #{memberId}, #{cashDate} )
